channel.title: NumPy on Wyatt Walsh
channel.description: Recent content in NumPy on Wyatt Walsh

item.title: Regularized Linear Regression Deep Dive
item.description: Explanations and Python implementations of Ordinary Least Squares regression, Ridge regression, Lasso regression (solved via Coordinate Descent), and Elastic Net regression (also solved via Coordinate Descent) applied to assess wine quality given numerous numerical features. Additional data analysis and visualization in Python is included.
